ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:42:03 [Issue ID 4000-151038] urn:comicvine:4000-151038 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:12:52. [Issue ID 262517]
ComicInfo.Summary: Who is the woman called Fable? Is she friend or is she foe? And what will her pressence mean to our intrepid adventurers in their quest to find the 23rd gear? Will she stand with them against the Steam Lords, Rust Troopers and Oak Trolls that seek to block their paths? Or will Bryce, Arthur and Yoshi find her pressence a detriment to their returning to the Dominion of Souls...or to their very survival? The Gear Station kicks into high gear with it's third ground-breaking issue, featuring stunning G23 Computer Graphic Images! The comic of the future is here today: The Gear Station!
ComicInfo.Title: Crossing The Threshold; Surprise!
ComicInfo.Writer: Ford Lytle Gilmore,Dan Fraga,Janak Alford,Steven Sanchez,Michael L. Murphy,Dan Fraga,Janak Alford,Ford Lytle Gilmore,Steven Sanchez,Michael L. Murphy
